title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.72 - Liability for loss, damage or failure to deliver parcels limited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.72 - Liability for loss, damage or failure to deliver parcels limited

State Regulations

Port Authority liability for loss of, or damage to, or
failure to deliver a parcel left in storage at the parcel check room shall be
limited to $25 unless a value in excess of $25 is declared and extra charge
paid when the parcel is checked. Value in excess of $25 may not be declared on
a parcel checked by a baggage transfer company. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1220.72

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
